mapper.select: SELECT cd.*, COALESCE( TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT cf.imageUrl SEPARATOR ', ') FROM camping_file cf WHERE cd.camping_contentId = cf.camping_contentId )), '' ) AS imageUrl, (CASE WHEN #{userId} IS NOT NULL THEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wish WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND camping_num = cd.camping_num ) ELSE null END) as iswished, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wish WHERE camping_num = cd.camping_num) as countwish FROM camping_details cd WHERE cd.camping_num = #{campingNum}
select count(*) from reservation where user_num = #{userNum} AND camping_num = #{campingNum}
select count(*) from review where user_num = ${userNum} AND camping_num = #{campingNum}
